QuestData.Title: What Goes Down, Must Come Up!
QuestData.Description: Rivett left behind what looks to be an important piece of equipment. Along its shaft you are able to make out the words: Goblin Drone Dispenser.$b$bWith a simple calibration, the device is set to deliver drones to Nazgrim's basecamp.$b$bEasy enough....$b$bThere's just one problem. The only supply crates worth transporting have fallen to the cliff ledge below the crash impact.$b$bAs you ponder the issue, you see the long, coiled tail of a Cliff Glider fly by the corner of your eye...
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Goblin Drone Dispenser near the Exposed Root to recover supplies.$b$bNOTE: Each use will require one Cliff Glider Tail.
